mapper.select: select a.id, a.appreciation, a.commentabled, a.content, a.create_time, a.description, a.first_picture, a.flag, a.share_statement, a.recommend, a.published, a.title, a.update_time, a.views, a.type_id, a.user_id, c.name as typeName, c.id, d.avatar, d.nickname, f.name, f.id from t_blog a left join t_blog_tags b on a.id = b.blogs_id left join t_type c on a.type_id = c.id left join t_user d on a.user_id = d.id left join t_blog_tags e on a.id = e.blogs_id left join t_tag f on e.tags_id = f.id where b.tags_id = #{tagsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select a.id, a.appreciation, a.commentabled, a.content, a.create_time, a.description, a.first_picture, a.flag, a.share_statement, a.recommend, a.published, a.title, a.update_time, a.views, a.type_id, a.user_id, c.name as typeName, c.id, d.name as tagName, e.nickname, e.avatar from t_blog a left join t_blog_tags b on a.id = b.blogs_id left join t_tag d on b.tags_id = d.id left join t_type c on a.type_id = c.id left join t_user e on a.user_id = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
